name: European Flavour Association
membership:
International Organization of the Flavor Industry (IOFI) 
http://www.iofi.org/
goal:
EFFA is a European non-profit trade association for the flavour industry, based in Brussels.
EFFA's vision is to be the voice of the flavour industry in Europe, leading a Europe-wide strategy to the benefit of the flavour industry, its customers and consumers alike
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Environment, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Flavouring Substance Evaluation Program
Implementation of EU Flavouring Regulation
Common Authorisation Procedure
Trade policy
